mapper.select:
SELECT rent.rent_no, rent.vrfc_hstry_sn, to_char(rent.rent_bgng_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') rent_bgng_dt, to_char(rent.rent_end_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') rent_end_dt, EXTRACT(DAY FROM (rent.rent_end_dt - rent.rent_bgng_dt)) || '일 ' || EXTRACT(HOUR FROM (rent.rent_end_dt - rent.rent_bgng_dt)) || ':' || LPAD(EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM (rent.rent_end_dt - rent.rent_bgng_dt))::TEXT, 2, '0') AS diff_dd_hh_mm, rent.vhcl_reg_no, rent.vin, agency.co_nm, COALESCE(agency.lotno_addr, agency.road_nm_addr) addr, dqvs.pca_decrypt(agency.telno, '150') telno, dqvs.pca_decrypt(verf.dln, '150') dln,
FROM dqvs.dvs_dqv_mt_rent rent LEFT JOIN dqvs.dvs_rac_mt_agency agency ON rent.bzmn_sn = agency.bzmn_sn LEFT JOIN dqvs.dvs_rac_mt_car car ON rent.vin = car.vin LEFT JOIN dqvs.dvs_dqv_hs_verf verf ON verf.vrfc_hstry_sn = rent.vrfc_hstry_sn where rent_no = #{rentNo} order by rent.mdfcn_dt, rent.reg_dt limit 1

select * from( select row_number() over() as rn , car.vhcl_reg_no, car.vin, car.carmdl, car.mdlyr, car.vhcl_nm, car.bzmn_sn, car.crno, car.ownr_nm, (select brno from dqvs.dvs_rac_mt_agency drma where bzmn_sn = car.bzmn_sn), car.engine_fom, case car.use_yn when 'Y' then '사용' when 'N' then '미사용' else '미상' END AS use_yn , to_char(car.reg_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') reg_dt from dqvs.dvs_rac_mt_car car where 1=1
and car.vhcl_reg_no like '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
and car.crno = (select crno from dqvs.dvs_rac_mt_agency where bzmn_sn = #{bzmnSn} )
) T WHERE 1 = 1
AND T.rn <= (CAST(#{take} AS INTEGER) + CAST(#{skip} AS INTEGER))
AND T.rn > CAST(#{skip} AS INTEGER)
ORDER BY T.rn ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT row_number() over() as rn , car.vhcl_reg_no, car.vin, car.carmdl, car.mdlyr, car.vhcl_nm, car.bzmn_sn, car.ownr_nm, (select brno from dqvs.dvs_rac_mt_agency drma where bzmn_sn = car.bzmn_sn), car.engine_fom, case car.use_yn when 'Y' then '사용' when 'N' then '미사용' else '미상' END AS use_yn , to_char(car.reg_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') reg_dt from dqvs.dvs_rac_mt_car car where 1=1
and car.vhcl_reg_no like '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
and car.crno = (select crno from dqvs.dvs_rac_mt_agency where bzmn_sn = #{bzmnSn} )
) AS T WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY T.rn ASC ) AS C
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO dqvs.dvs_dqv_mt_rent (rent_no, vin, vhcl_reg_no,
bzmn_sn,
use_yn,
sgg_cd,
rent_bgng_dt, rent_end_dt, rent_prcs_dt, rent_stts_cd, rgtr_sn, reg_dt,
reg_ip ) VALUES ((((('R'::text || to_char(now(), 'YY'::text)) || '-'::text) || lpad(nextval(('seq_dvs_dqv_mt_rent_'::text || to_char(now(), 'YY'::text))::regclass)::text, 9, '0'::text))), #{vin}, #{vhclRegNo},
#{bzmnSn},
'Y',
#{cmptncZoneCd},
#{rentBgngDt}::timestamp, #{rentEndDt}::timestamp, now(), '1', #{userSn}::numeric, now()::timestamp,
#{IP} )

INSERT INTO dqvs.dvs_dqv_hs_rent (rent_no, rent_hstry_no, vrfc_hstry_sn, vin, vhcl_reg_no,
bzmn_sn,
use_yn,
sgg_cd,
rent_bgng_dt, rent_end_dt, rent_prcs_dt, rent_stts_cd, rgtr_sn, reg_dt,
reg_ip ) VALUES ((((('R'::text || to_char(now(), 'YY'::text)) || '-'::text) || lpad(nextval(('seq_dvs_dqv_mt_rent_'::text || to_char(now(), 'YY'::text))::regclass)::text, 9, '0'::text))), nextval('dqvs.seq_dvs_dqv_hs_rent'::regclass), '9'::numeric, #{vin}, #{vhclRegNo},
#{bzmnSn},
'Y',
#{cmptncZoneCd},
#{rentBgngDt}::timestamp, #{rentEndDt}::timestamp, now(), '2', #{userSn}::numeric, now()::timestamp,
#{IP} )
mapper.select: /* 대여이력 상세 */ SELECT rent.rent_no , rent.vhcl_reg_no , TO_CHAR(rent.rent_bgng_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') rent_bgng_dt , TO_CHAR(rent.rent_end_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') rent_end_dt , rent.rent_stts_cd , rent.del_yn , CASE rent.rent_stts_cd WHEN '1' THEN '미확정' WHEN '2' THEN '대여확정' WHEN '9' THEN '대여취소' ELSE rent.rent_stts_cd END rent_stts_nm , CASE rent.oneway_yn WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END oneway_yn FROM dqvs.dvs_dqv_mt_rent rent LEFT JOIN dqvs.dvs_rac_mt_car car ON rent.vin = car.vin WHERE rent.rent_no = #{rentNo}

/* 자격확인 정보 */ SELECT TO_CHAR(verf.vrfc_dmnd_dt, 'YYYYMMDD') AS vrfc_dmnd_dt , CONCAT(dqvs.pca_decrypt(verf.dln, '150'), '******') AS dln , to_char(verf.vrfc_dmnd_dt,'YYYYMMDD') vrfc_dmnd_dt ,COALESCE(verf.vrfc_dmnd_dt::TEXT, '-') vrfc_dmnd_dt2 , COALESCE(CASE verf.vrfc_mthd WHEN '1' THEN '직접입력' WHEN '2' THEN 'OCR' WHEN '3' THEN '모바일면허증' WHEN '4' THEN 'API' END, '-') vrfc_mthd , COALESCE(CASE WHEN verf.req_rslt_cd IN('00', '1', '0') THEN dqvs.fn_get_cdnm('verify_cd', verf.vrfc_rslt_cd) ELSE dqvs.fn_get_cdnm('vrfc_rslt', verf.req_rslt_cd) END, '-') vrfc_rslt , CASE WHEN face_similarity ISNULL OR face_similarity = 0 THEN NULL ELSE face_similarity END face_similarity , CASE WHEN face_liveness ISNULL OR face_liveness = 0 THEN NULL ELSE face_liveness END face_liveness FROM dqvs.dvs_dqv_hs_verf verf WHERE vrfc_dmnd_dt BETWEEN #{DateMaker}::timestamp AND (#{DateMaker}::timestamp + INTERVAL '1 day') and verf.vrfc_hstry_sn = #{vrfcHstrySn}
mapper.update:
UPDATE dqvs.dvs_dqv_mt_rent
SET rent_stts_cd = '9', rent_end_dt = #{rentEndDt}::timestamp, rent_bgng_dt= #{rentBgngDt}::timestamp, mdfcn_ip= #{IP}, mdfr_sn= #{userSn}::numeric, mdfcn_dt= now()::timestamp
SET rent_stts_cd = '2', mdfcn_ip= #{IP}, mdfr_sn= #{userSn}::numeric, mdfcn_dt= now()::timestamp
SET
vin = #{vin},
rgtr_sn = #{rgtrSn}::numeric,
vhcl_reg_no = #{vhclRegNo},
bzmn_sn = #{bzmnSn},
oneway_yn = #{onewayYn}, rent_end_dt = #{rentEndDt}::timestamp, rent_bgng_dt= #{rentBgngDt}::timestamp, mdfcn_ip= #{IP}, mdfr_sn= #{userSn}::numeric, mdfcn_dt= now()::timestamp
WHERE rent_no = #{rentNo}

update.if: UPDATE dqvs.dvs_dqv_mt_rent SET del_yn = 'Y', use_yn = 'N', mdfcn_ip= #{IP}, mdfr_sn= #{userSn}::numeric, mdfcn_dt= now()::timestamp WHERE rent_no = #{rentNo}

mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO dqvs.dvs_dqv_hs_rent ( rent_no, rent_hstry_no, vin, vhcl_reg_no, bzmn_sn, use_yn,
sgg_cd,
vrfc_hstry_sn, rent_bgng_dt, rent_end_dt, rent_stts_cd, rgtr_sn, reg_dt, reg_ip, rent_prcs_dt,
mdfr_sn, mdfcn_dt, mdfcn_ip) select rent_no, nextval('dqvs.seq_dvs_dqv_hs_rent'::regclass), vin, vhcl_reg_no, bzmn_sn, use_yn,
sgg_cd,
vrfc_hstry_sn, rent_bgng_dt, rent_end_dt, rent_stts_cd, rgtr_sn, reg_dt, reg_ip, rent_prcs_dt,
mdfr_sn, mdfcn_dt, mdfcn_ip from dqvs.dvs_dqv_mt_rent WHERE rent_no = #{rentNo}
mapper.select:
select rent_no , rent_hstry_no , vin , vhcl_reg_no , bzmn_sn , use_yn , sgg_cd , vrfc_hstry_sn , rmrk , rent_bgng_dt , rent_end_dt , rent_prcs_dt , rent_stts_cd , rgtr_sn , reg_dt , reg_ip , mdfr_sn , mdfcn_dt , mdfcn_ip
, del_yn , vhcl_idnty_cd from dqvs.dvs_dqv_hs_rent where rent_no = #{rentNo}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO dqvs.dvs_dqv_hs_conf (rent_no, cnfrmn_hstry_no, vin, vhcl_reg_no, carmdl, mdlyr, vhcl_nm, bzmn_sn, engine_fom, use_yn, sgg_cd, dln, vrfc_hstry_sn, rent_bgng_dt, rent_end_dt, rgtr_sn, reg_dt, reg_ip, rent_prcs_dt,
mdfr_sn, mdfcn_dt, mdfcn_ip) select rent.rent_no, (select (COALESCE(count(cnfrmn_hstry_no), 0) + 1)::varchar as cnfrmn_hstry_no from dqvs.dvs_dqv_hs_conf where rent_no=#{rentNo}) cnfrmn_hstry_no , rent.vin, rent.vhcl_reg_no, car.carmdl, car.mdlyr, car.vhcl_nm, rent.bzmn_sn, car.engine_fom, rent.use_yn, rent.sgg_cd, verf.dln, rent.vrfc_hstry_sn, rent.rent_bgng_dt, rent.rent_end_dt, rent.rgtr_sn, rent.reg_dt, rent.reg_ip, rent.rent_prcs_dt,
#{userSn}::numeric, now()::timestamp, #{clientIP} from dqvs.dvs_dqv_mt_rent rent LEFT JOIN dqvs.dvs_dqv_hs_verf verf ON verf.vrfc_hstry_sn = rent.vrfc_hstry_sn LEFT JOIN dqvs.dvs_rac_mt_car car ON car.vin = rent.vin WHERE rent.rent_no = #{rentNo} order by rent_no
mapper.select:
SELECT rent.rent_hstry_no, rent.rent_no, rent.vhcl_reg_no,
to_char(rent.rent_bgng_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') rent_bgng_dt, to_char(rent.rent_end_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') rent_end_dt, rent.rent_stts_cd, rent.del_yn, rent.rgtr_sn, (select user_nm from dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_sso where user_sn = rent.rgtr_sn) as user_nm, to_char(rent.reg_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as reg_dt, CASE rent.rent_stts_cd WHEN '1' THEN '미확정' WHEN '2' THEN '대여확정' WHEN '9' THEN '대여취소' ELSE rent.rent_stts_cd END AS rent_stts_nm, CASE rent.oneway_yn WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END oneway_yn FROM dqvs.dvs_dqv_hs_rent rent left join dqvs.dvs_rac_mt_car car on rent.vin = car.vin
WHERE rent.rent_no = #{rentNo} ORDER BY rent.rent_hstry_no DESC

select count(*) from( select rent.rent_hstry_no, rent.rent_no, rent.vhcl_reg_no,
to_char(rent.rent_bgng_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') rent_bgng_dt, to_char(rent.rent_end_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') rent_end_dt, rent.rent_stts_cd, rent.del_yn, CASE rent.rent_stts_cd WHEN '1' THEN '미확정' WHEN '2' THEN '대여확정' WHEN '9' THEN '대여취소' ELSE rent.rent_stts_cd END AS rent_stts_nm from dqvs.dvs_dqv_hs_rent rent left join dqvs.dvs_rac_mt_car car on rent.vin = car.vin
where rent.rent_no = #{rentNo} )T
mapper.update: UPDATE dqvs.dvs_dqv_vrfc_rsvt SET vrfc_period = #{periodRsv}, rsvt_bgng_ymd = #{srtDt}::timestamp mdfcn_ip= #{IP}, mdfr_sn= #{userSn}::numeric, mdfcn_dt= now()::timestamp WHERE rent_no = #{rentNo}
mapper.select: select cd_nm ,concat(cd_group,'_', cd) as vrfc_rslt , cd FROM dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_code WHERE cd_group = 'vrfc_rslt' and use_yn ='Y' and del_yn='N' order by cd_nm asc
